turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order two medium pizzas from Bella Luna, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thick crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a meat lover's with with bacon and jalapeños and olives, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what kind of toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For the other one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and for the other?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is there a pizza that has artichokes?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I'll build my own custom pizza, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the veggie lovers has artichokes in it or you can build your own custom pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: artichokes, bacon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: pineapple.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: extra sauce.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: With extra mushrooms, please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And cheese, and that will be all.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds fantastic, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 2 medium thick crust pizzas, one veggie lovers with jalapenos and olives and 1 with artichokes, bacon, pineapple, and extra sauce, and extra mushrooms, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll pick that up, please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Those are two medium thick crust, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $38, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, fantastic. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: that's correct.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fantastic. Have a nice night, you're the best.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks. I will.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: enjoy your pizzas.
